about_the_game:
Originally born during the GMTK 2023 Game Jam, 'Help Bipboop' is a challenging puzzler that will rev your cognitive gears. Guide Bipboop, the autonomously-driven little robot, to his destination. You do not control Bipboop directly. Instead, you arrange the terrain blocks to create his pathway. Once you have fine-tuned your path, hit the play button and Bipboop will perform his pre-programmed movement sequence.



Bipboop's location resets if he falls off the grid or encounters any obstacles that might cause his demise. You must strategically place terrain blocks to keep him on the right path.
Here is an example of a movable terrain block:


The game features various types of terrain blocks, including bridges, walls, buttons, and teleporters, allowing you to craft creative solutions to the puzzles.

This demo showcases different mechanics that will exist in the final version and the desired difficulty throughout the experience. Very few of the levels present here will not be in the final version, so feel free to enjoy playing the game. Complete this puzzle that we have developed for you!

A level editor is planned for the full version and is not available at the moment.

short_description: Guide Bipboop, the autonomous little robot, through a series of mind-bending puzzles. You don't control Bipboop directly; instead, place terrain blocks strategically to help him reach the end. Are you up for the challenge?
